# API Specification

## Overview

<!-- Describe the API surface for {{repoName}}. -->

**Base URL:** `https://api.example.com/v1`
**Version:** {{version}}
**Format:** JSON

## Authentication

<!-- Summarise the authentication approach; see docs/04_api/03_authentication.md for details. -->

## Conventions

| Convention | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| Date format | ISO 8601 |
| Pagination | Cursor-based |
| Error format | RFC 7807 Problem Details |
| Rate limiting | <!-- e.g. 100 req/min --> |

## Endpoints Summary

| Method | Path | Description |
|--------|------|-------------|
| `GET` | `/resource` | List resources |
| `POST` | `/resource` | Create a resource |
| `GET` | `/resource/:id` | Retrieve a resource |
| `PUT` | `/resource/:id` | Update a resource |
| `DELETE` | `/resource/:id` | Delete a resource |

## Error Codes

| Code | Meaning | Resolution |
|------|---------|------------|
| 400 | Bad Request | Check request body against schema |
| 401 | Unauthorised | Provide valid credentials |
| 404 | Not Found | Verify resource ID |
| 429 | Rate Limited | Back off and retry |
| 500 | Internal Error | Contact support |
